body: @bullshirr lol I'm not talking about the canon universe. I just said I don't like lolicon; the artist of this doujin should focus on just Naruto x Sakura instead of bringing in Sarada.
how to download manga in this website
@greengrasstree stop being a butthurt narusaku fan, sakura in the canon universe would never cheat on sasuke with naruto, sakrua don't loves naruto in a romantic way in the canon manga
I'm all for more Naruto x Sakura from this guy, but not when it includes lolicon. At least take Sarada out and focus on just Naruto x Sakura again.
@imitation Most of those non-canon doujin pairings were made before the manga ended
@hithummah What makes you think he's butthurt? It's not as if there aren't plenty of other doujin with non-canon pairings.
Oh look another NaruSaku by this author. Man this dude is really butthurt, come on it's already 3years.

He does what the people want. I remember a page in one of these doujins where he mentions he takes requests over twitter and would do something different/something else after the next Sarada doujin, which was this one. Personally I'm hoping to see some of the other women.
